text: Saint Maria Goretti (born Ancona, Italy, 1890-1902) is a Roman Catholic saint. She died of stab wounds when she was 11 after an attempted rape, when she refused to submit to her attacker's demands. She is canonizated and remembered in the Catholic church on July 6. ==Other websites== *Biography at Catholic online Category:Christian saints Category:1890 births Category:1902 deaths Category:People from Ancona
title: Maria Goretti
